uk.ac.cam.cjo41.gameoflife

Class PatternStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cjo41.gameoflife.PatternStore

  • public class PatternStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Gets patterns from a text file source (either locally or from a URL) and stores them. Provides methods to get these patterns, e.g. by name, author etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor - takes a Reader which has already been instantiated, e.g.
      PatternStore(java.lang.String source)
      Constructor - takes path to text file containing patterns.
